name: shaderforge-lib
description: A library for creating WebGPU shader effects on webpages and webapps.

scripts.package: rm -rf dist/package && mkdir -p dist/package && cp package.json README.md dist/package/ && tsc --outDir dist/package
scripts.build:examples: npm run package && for d in examples/*/ ; do (cd "$d" && rm -rf dist && npm install ../../dist/package && npm run build); done
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist && [ -d examples ] && [ "$(ls -A examples)" ] && for d in examples/*/ ; do (cd "$d" && rm -rf dist node_modules package-lock.json); done || true
